attributes.action: We would like the government to sign a contact.
attributes.additional_details: Instead of or alongside the government's manifesto, they should sign a legally binding contract which holds them to account and should they do something outside of those parameters then they should be held accountable and go through employment law, similar to anyone who has a job with a contract.
attributes.background: We would like the government to sign a contract (one similar to a job contract) in which they have to work to. If they fail to abide by the terms they've set out then they should not be in power.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
